about_the_game:
"


The Wondrous Tome of Wands


By: 
Scoundrel Game Labs

The Wondrous Tome of Wands provides more than 100 new magical wands for the world's greatest role-playing game. These magical items are carefully balanced and the module includes beautiful illustrations.
In addition to wands of every rarity level,
The Wondrous Tome of Wands includes cursed artifacts and sentient wands with unique personalities that could turn your 5th Edition fantasy campaign upside down.
"
